replies.body:
Opinions? 
i liek to target u on nexus when using pyro

Nah, in all honesty, you're a great person, ingame or not. Just don't use your Jalapenos sweat on me plz

is this an ama? probably not

opinions: use your microphone more so we can hear your sexy voice. Loves to play megascrims and ur the g0d that taught me how to cannon. Nice player once known a bit better.

replies.body:
Waiting for a fat man to defy physics and fall down something that he really shouldn't be able to. The fat man then rewards you for whatever shit you did that year whether it be good or bad. He also decides to eat some food to get even fatter then he once was and gives some food to his lazy, overweight horse with antlers that he calls "reindeer".

Christmas in a nutshell.
